    • Method Detail

      • uiReadyNegotiation

        public static NegotiationBuilder uiReadyNegotiation()
        Creates a new, ui ready, NegotiationBuilder with the following fields set
        • Claim - if a claim is specified via onClaim or by using claimBuilder.withNegotiation then use the specified claim. Otherwise a new ui ready auto claim is created.
        • Name - set to unique title of the form NameN
          Returns:
          a new ui ready builder

        • onClaim

          public NegotiationBuilder onClaim(Claim claim)
          Sets the related claim.
          Parameters:
          claim - the desired value
          Returns:
          the modified builder

        • withSettleNegotiation

          public NegotiationBuilder withSettleNegotiation(java.util.Date date,
                                                NegotiationType type,
                                                CurrencyAmount amount,
                                                java.lang.String note)
          Add a negotiation line to the negotiation
          Parameters:
          date - the negotiation date
          type - the type of negotiation (offer, demand, counter etc.)
          amount - the amount discussed, if applicable
          note - notes on the negotiation line
          Returns:
          the modified builder
